title: Drop in frames (Small problem)
body: I have been going up the ladder and haave had small amounts of frame issues that hurt in a large way. My Screen locks up but the game continues. The game runes smooth otherwise. I try keeping it at the lowest settings but that isnt working either.

replies.body: This issue could be caused by outdated drivers, corrupt game files, or something else entirely.  As a first step, your best bet would be to go over the instructions in our[ FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up but let me know!
Thank you ill check it out.
